page.title: 06Concern for the Hungry
page.content: When asked about their hopes and fears for the future,people invariably mentioned the threat of{nuclear war and{unemployment.}However, over-riding these fears was the overwhelming concern for the plight of the{starving {people of Ethiopia.}Media coverage motivated local children to hold fund raising events like{sponsored fasts. People were inspired to greater efforts when{'Band Aid'}conceived and organised by{Bob Geldof}made a No. 1 record donating all the proceeds to Ethiopia.Helped by the BBC he followed this by turning the world into a {Global Juke box}with top pop stars providing a World wide non stop 10hour show which raised over{Â£40 million. Local people were present at a similar National event at the{Eisteddfod called{'Arian Byw'}and many pledged donations via phone and banks.
